mapper.select: select gm.UID from group_members as gm inner join user on gm.UID = user.UID inner join user_info on gm.UID=user_info.UID where user.nickName=#{nickName} and user.sex=#{sex} and user.age >= #{low_age} and user.age <=#{high_age} and user_info.nowLiveAt=#{nowLiveAt} and user_info.homeTown=#{homeTown} and user_info.aboutLove=#{aboutLove}
mapper.update: update group_members set status=#{status},privilege=#{privilege} where GID=#{GID} and UID=#{UID}
mapper.delete: delete from group_members where GID=#{GID} and UID=#{UID}
